about_the_game:
ENTER ZEEBO'S NIGHTMARE

Zeebo wakes up multiple times at night after the most bizarre dream where his body painfully morphs. Home alone, Zeebo mourns his parents' recent death with only his few friends and pet Hekke by his side. But no one knows just why his nightmares are this intense. As he receives a dream helmet and dream controller through his best friend Laurencia, Zeebo now has the tools to take control of his dream...and find out what's happening to him.

INTO THE FRAY

A dungeon-crawling action-RPG in a surreal nightmare with mind-bending levels and surreal events. Rich in lore, it's set in an entirely original fantasy world called Neebota. Face bizarre creatures as well yourself in different forms, as you transform yourself to gain new abilities and defeat the worst demons haunting Zeebo's mind in a quest to overcome the self.

THE WORLD OF NEEBOTA

Neebota is inhabited by beings who undergo many of the same emotions and experiences we humans do: hope, joy, loss, dreams, curiosity, and overcoming the self. And with this endless string of nightmares, Zeebo's first challenge is to overcome himself in his nightmares. Get to know a new magical universe inspired by Ghibli with elements of surrealism and horror.

FEATURES

  • A unique blend of JRPG and PC RPG elements

  • Beautifully bizarre dream dungeons to explore and conquer

  • A class-swap system with morphs granting unique abilities

  • Surreal events that will unexpectedly twist gameplay like in Eternal Darkness

  • Dynamically created segments and areas making each playthrough unique

  • Imaginative fantastical bosses, mini-bosses and enemies

  • A new and entirely original fantasy world, rich with lore

WANT TO KNOW MORE?

Neebota is a whole new and original world developed by Frying Jelly that debuts in 99 Fails. Learn more about it

name: Neebota: Zeebo's Nightmare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K, Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 GB available space

short_description: An open world RPG in Zeebo's bizarre nightmare with class-swapping morphs and surreal dungeons. Conquer Zeebo's mind by exploring an original fantasy world with creatures to a soundtrack by David Wise that will stay with you long after you stopped playing.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
